AssistAttribute.1.1:
A squad made entirely of Ventus Trekkers.
Fully embrace the elegant and rapid-flowing combat style with a Ventus Squad.
AssistAttribute.1.2: A Vanguard Trekker is usually assigned to the Main position. Deals massive DMG and can trigger Marks of their corresponding Element.
AssistAttribute.1.3: A Versatile Trekker can be assigned to both Main and Support positions. At the support position, deals massive DMG and provides minor buffs.
AssistAttribute.1.4: A Support Trekker is usually assigned to the Support position. Inflicts Element-specific Marks and provides buffs to the squad.
